product_name: CamelBak UnBottle Insulated Reservoir - 70 fl. oz.
long_description: The BPA-free CamelBak UnBottle insulated reservoir carries hydrating fluid inside or outside your backpack. It features an updated reservoir with improved stability and quick-connect enhancements.
short_description: The BPA-free CamelBak UnBottle insulated reservoir carries hydrating fluid inside or outside your backpack. It features an updated reservoir with improved stability and quick-connect enhancements.
